entry.title: May 2014 Meetup
entry.summary:
What: Meetup
When: May 27 2014 08:00PM
Where: Function Room, Handuraw Pizza, Gorordo St., Cebu City, PH

It feels like a long time but finally we now have talks for this month's meetup, we also have a guest speaker this month, JP, who's with us at engageSPARK for the fellowship program.

Anyway here are the list of talks and see you all soon at our mini-cult meetup. :P

Talks

Talk Speaker Handle
Testing with Python Daryl Yu @dar9000
Magic! The joys and perils of writing Ruby, the cuddliest language JP Bonner @bonneroo

Sponsors

  • Python.PH

More sponsors are always welcome, feel free to contact us.

entry.title: April 2014 Meetup
entry.summary:
What: Meetup
When: April. 5 2014 03:00PM
Where: Function Room, Handuraw Pizza, Gorordo St., Cebu City, PH

It'll be our 6th meetup and unfortunately we're to busy to make on our usual schedule of last tuesday of the month so instead we're moving it to April 5th.

Also, we finally have our meetup page and you can RSVP on the upcoming event here. There's only limited spot due to limited space and as of today there's only 11 spots left so don't forget to RSVP ahead.

This month's meetup is also special since PythonPH is sponsoring the event and we have a guest from the group, Andrew Robillo, who will be speaking about SQLAlchemy.

Talks

Talk Speaker Handle
SQLAlchemy in an Hour Andrew Robillo @shimofuri_mu
Introduction to Docker Marconi Moreto @marconimjr

Sponsors

  • Python.PH

More sponsors are always welcome, feel free to contact us.

entry.title: January 2014 Meetup
entry.summary:
What: Meetup
When: 1390906800
Where: Room 1601, Tower 3, Crown Regency Hotel, Osme√±a Boulevard, Cebu City, Philippines

Talks

Happy New Year everyone, we hope you had a good start of the year and we would like to make it even better by presenting the following talks for this month:

Talk Speaker Handle
SaltStack 101 Marconi Moreto @marconimjr
Unix: A Gentle Introduction Zakatell Kanda @zmkanda

PyCon

This year couldn't be better, the 2nd PyCon Philippines will be next month already. Some members of the community will be going and might even speak, this is really exciting so don't forget to visit the site for more info.

Sponsors

  • StarTechUp

More sponsors are always welcome, feel free to contact us.
